Uses of Class
edu.southalabama.csc527.smallworld.model.World

  • Packages that use World 
    Package Description
    edu.southalabama.csc527.smallworld  
    edu.southalabama.csc527.smallworld.controller
    This package manipulates the game model in a (nearly) user-interface-agnostic manner.
    edu.southalabama.csc527.smallworld.model
    This package contains several classes that represent the game state, e.g., the game map, items, and the player.
    edu.southalabama.csc527.smallworld.persistence
    This package's purpose is to create and load game data files.
    edu.southalabama.csc527.smallworld.textui
    This package contains classes that support the construction of text-based user interfaces.
    edu.southalabama.csc527.smallworld.textui.parser
    This package contains the logic to "parse" or understand what the user types into the game.

      Loads the game state from the specified InputStream and creates a World usable World instance.
      static World WorldPersistence.loadWorld(java.lang.String classpathLocation)
      Loads the game state from the specified filename on the Java classpath of the running program and creates a usable World instance.
